channel.title: Pages on Carpentry at the University of Oslo
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Carpentry at the University of Oslo

item.description: Workshops # Upcoming # Carpentry pilot Workshop (Online): Introduction to Conda for (Data) Scientists 8 January 2021, Online via Zoom Conda is an open source package and environment management system. This workshop is for you who wants to learn more about use of Conda as a development tool for building and sharing project specific software environments that facilitate reproducible (data) science workflows. (more information) To learn more about our workshops or register for one of them go to the University of Oslo Library’s Carpentry course catalogue.
